trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 表示处理的方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView"></xref>控件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button within the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control is clicked.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand>中的按钮时引发事件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件被单击。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 这使您可以提供每次此事件发生时执行的自定义的例程的事件处理方法。

trans-unit.source: Buttons within a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control can also invoke some of the built-in functionality of the control.
trans-unit.target: 中的按钮<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件也可以调用某些控件的内置功能。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: To perform one of these operations, set the `CommandName` property of a button to one of the values in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 若要执行这些操作之一，设置`CommandName`为下表中的值之一的按钮的属性。

trans-unit.source: |CommandName value|Description| |-----------------------|-----------------| |"Cancel"|Cancels an edit or insert operation and returns the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control to the mode specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: |CommandName 值 |说明 | |-----------------------|-----------------| |"取消"|取消编辑或插入操作，并返回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件添加到所指定的模式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A>属性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.DefaultMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Delete"|Deletes the current record.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>事件。 | |"删除"|删除当前记录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> events.| |"Edit"|Puts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting>事件。 | |"编辑"|放入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件处于编辑模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemDeleted>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Insert"|Inserts the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>事件。 | |"插入"|在数据源中插入当前记录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> events.| |"New"|Puts the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> control in insert mode.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting>事件。 | |"新"|放入<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView>控件置于插入模式。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemInserted>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> events.| |"Page"|Performs a paging operation.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging>事件。 | |"页"|执行分页操作。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ModeChanged>

trans-unit.source: Set the `CommandArgument` property of the button to "First", "Last", "Next", "Prev", or a page number to specify the type of paging operation to perform.
trans-unit.target: 设置`CommandArgument`的按钮为"First"，"最后"、"下一步"、"上一步"或执行页编号，以指定的分页操作类型的属性。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> events.| |"Update"|Updates the current record in the data source.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging>事件。 | |"更新"|更新数据源中的当前记录。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanging> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.PageIndexChanged>

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> events.| Although the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand> event is raised when a button listed in the previous table is clicked, it is recommended that you handle the events listed in the table for the operation.
trans-unit.target: 引发<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating>事件。 | 尽管<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand>单击上表中列出的按钮时将引发事件，则我们建议你处理该操作的表中列出的事件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormView.ItemUpdated>

trans-unit.source: When you create a FormViewCommandEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 FormViewCommandEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[NIB︰ 事件和委托](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
